response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we are confident it would be an excellent investment for you. We are offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a unique chance to acquire a product that is valued at $800,000 by you but is available at a premium that reflects its true worth and potential impact on your business. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 950000}
